biotools.summary: Webserver that computes protein structure refinement based on minimization of a knowledge-based potential of mean force. Stereochemistry may also be optimized using the MESHI software.

bioschemas.name: KoBaMIN
bioschemas.summary: Webserver that computes protein structure refinement based on minimization of a knowledge-based potential of mean force. Stereochemistry may also be optimized using the MESHI software.
